articles.title: All international travelers should get measles vaccinations, CDC says - AP News
articles.description: U.S. health officials have changed their advice to international travelers about measles, saying Americans should be vaccinated against the disease no matter where they travel in the world. U.S. residents are recommended to get measles-mumps-rubella shots, an…
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) U.S. health officials have changed their advice to international travelers about measles, saying that Americans should be vaccinated against the virus no matter where theyre going.

articles.title: Tulsa, Oklahoma, plans more than $105m in reparations for America's 'hidden' massacre - BBC
articles.description: A century ago, a white mob burned down part of the Oklahoma city known as "Black Wall Street", killing hundreds.
articles.content:
Brandon Drenon
The city of Tulsa, Oklahoma is preparing to award its black community a $105m (£73.8m) reparations package to address the harms caused by the Tulsa Race Massacre of 1921, one of the l… [+3500 chars]
